00020 
00021 #ifndef FOREACH_H_
00022 #define FOREACH_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include <cstddef>
00026 
00027 struct foreach_container_base {
00028 };
00029 
00030 template <class T>
00031 struct foreach_container : public foreach_container_base {
00032 
00033     inline foreach_container(const T & t) : c(t), brk(0), i(c.begin()),
00034     e(c.end()) {
00035     };
00036     const T c;
00037     mutable int brk;
00038     mutable typename T::const_iterator i, e;
00039 
00040     inline bool condition() const {
00041         return (!brk++ && i != e);
00042     }
00043 };
00044 
00045 template <class T>
00046 inline T* foreach_pointer(const T&) {
00047     return Sylph::null;
00048 }
00049 
00050 template <class T>
00051 inline foreach_container<T> foreach_container_create(const T& t) {
00052     return foreach_container<T > (t);
00053 }
00054 
00055 template <typename T>
00056 inline const foreach_container<T>* foreach_cast(
00057         const foreach_container_base& base, const T&) {
00058     return static_cast<const foreach_container<T*> *> (base);
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 #define sforeach(variable, container) \
00063 for (const ::foreach_container_base &_container_ = \
00064     ::foreach_container_create(container); ::foreach_cast(_container_, \
00065     true ? 0 : ::foreach_pointer(container))->condition(); \
00066     ++::foreach_cast(_container_, true ? 0 : \
00067     ::foreach_pointer(container))->i) \
00068     for (variable = *::foreach_cast(_container_, true ? 0 : \
00069             ::foreach_pointer(container))->i; ::foreach_cast(_container_, \
00070             true ? 0 : ::foreach_pointer(container))->brk; \
00071             --::foreach_cast(_container_, true ? 0 : \
00072             ::foreach_cast(container))->brk)
00073 
00074 #endif  /* FOREACH_H_ */
00075
